synopsis.text:
Momona, a typical junior high student from Jewel Land, finds herself in an extraordinary situation on her cousin's wedding day. Envious of the bride, Lady Diana, Momona soon warms up to her after witnessing the couple's genuine affection. However, before she can formally meet Diana, Momona is whisked away to a wintry landscape in Jewel Land. Here, she encounters Ruby, a white rabbit and her new mentor, who introduces her to the Petit Ladies, all vying to become the next Lady Jewel, the realm's highest-ranking lady.

Momona, now a Jewel Candidate, must outperform her rivals in various tasks to claim the prestigious title. Among her competitors is Lillian, who aspires to win and appoint her brother, Cayenne, as her King. Complicating matters, Momona finds herself drawn to Cayenne, a sentiment that seems mutual, much to Lillian's disapproval.

As Momona and Ruby navigate through the challenges, they must confront not only Lillian and her Jewelpet partner but also their burgeoning feelings for Cayenne. Will Momona triumph and become the next Lady Jewel? Will she and Lillian overcome their rivalry and forge a friendship? And what fate awaits Momona and Cayenne's budding romance? Only time will tell in this enchanting tale of love, friendship, and ambition.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
